content: this pattern is featured in the august 2021 issue of pattern pack pro this pattern is for a men s monochromatic crochet scarf level intermediate recommended yarn worsted medium weight 4 i used red heart super saver yarn finished size 8 x 77 not including fringe the pattern uses crochet us terms free version of this pattern is available on my website https //www goldenlucycrafts com/crochet-monochromatic-men-scarf-pattern/ by purchasing this listing you will receive the pattern in a print-friendly styled and advertisement-free pdf file format
